00020 #include <gsl/gsl_vector.h>
00021 #include <gsl/gsl_matrix.h>
00022 #include <gsl/gsl_eigen.h>
00023 #include "dmatrix_algebra.h"

00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00026 
00027 DMatrix<double> rot3z(double theta) {
00028     DMatrix<double> m(3,3);
00029     m[0][0] = cos(theta);
00030     m[0][1] = -sin(theta);
00031     m[1][0] = sin(theta);
00032     m[1][1] = cos(theta);
00033     
00034     m[0][2] = 0;
00035     m[1][2] = 0;
00036     m[2][0] = 0;
00037     m[2][1] = 0;
00038     m[2][2] = 1;
00039     
00040     return m;
00041 }

00043 
00044     bool isDefinitePositive(const DMatrixD& m) {
00045         double l[2]; Point2d v[2];
00046         RDK2::Geometry::eig22_gsl(m, l[0], v[0], l[1],v[1]);
00047         return l[0] > 0 && l[1] > 0;
00048     }
00049     
00050     bool isSemiDefinitePositive(const DMatrixD& m) {
00051         double l[2]; Point2d v[2];
00052         RDK2::Geometry::eig22_gsl(m, l[0], v[0], l[1],v[1]);
00053         return l[0] >= 0 && l[1] >= 0;
00054     }
00055     
00056     DMatrix<double> reassembleFromEig(
00057         double lambda1, Point2d v1, 
00058         double lambda2, Point2d v2) {
00059             
00060         DMatrixD P(2,2);
00061         P.el(0,0) = v1.x; P.el(0,1) = v2.x;
00062         P.el(1,0) = v1.y; P.el(1,1) = v2.y;
00063         
00064         DMatrixD D(2,2);
00065         D.el(0,0) = lambda1; D.el(0,1) = 0;
00066         D.el(1,0) = 0; D.el(1,1) = lambda2;
00067         
00068         return P * D * P.inv();
00069     }
00070 
00071     
00072 void copy(const DMatrix<double>&m, gsl_matrix * gslm) {
00073     for(int i=0;i<m.rows();i++)
00074     for(int j=0;j<m.columns();j++)
00075         gsl_matrix_set (gslm, i,j, m[i][j]);
00076 }
00077 
00078 double uncertainty(const DMatrixD&m) {
00079     double l[2] = {0,0};
00080     Point2d v[2];
00081     if(eig22_gsl(m, l[0],v[0],l[1],v[1])) {
00082         return sqrt(std::max(l[0],l[1]));
00083     } 
00084     return 0;
00085 }
00086 bool eig22_gsl(
00087     const DMatrix<double>&m, 
00088     double& lambda1, Point2d& v1, 
00089     double& lambda2, Point2d& v2) {
00090     
00091     assert(m.rows()==2);
00092     assert(m.columns()==2);
00093     
00094     gsl_matrix            *matrix = gsl_matrix_alloc(2,2);
00095     gsl_vector              *eval = gsl_vector_alloc(2);
00096     gsl_matrix              *evec = gsl_matrix_alloc(2,2);
00097     gsl_eigen_symmv_workspace *ws = gsl_eigen_symmv_alloc(2);
00098     
00099     copy(m, matrix);
00100     // XXX errors?
00101     gsl_eigen_symmv(matrix, eval, evec, ws);
00102     
00103     lambda1 = gsl_vector_get(eval, 0);
00104     lambda2 = gsl_vector_get(eval, 1);
00105     v1 = Point2d(gsl_matrix_get(evec, 0, 0),gsl_matrix_get(evec, 1, 0));
00106     v2 = Point2d(gsl_matrix_get(evec, 0, 1),gsl_matrix_get(evec, 1, 1));
00107     
00108     gsl_vector_free(eval);
00109     gsl_matrix_free(evec);
00110     gsl_matrix_free(matrix);
00111     gsl_eigen_symmv_free(ws);
00112     return true;
00113 }
00114 
00115 bool getWhiteningMatrix22(const DMatrix<double>&m, DMatrix<double>&w) {
00116     Point2d v[2];
00117     double l[2];
00118 
00119     if(m.rows()!=2 || m.columns() != 2) {
00120         return false;
00121     }
00122     
00123     if(!eig22_gsl(m, l[0], v[0], l[1], v[1])) {
00124         return false;
00125     }
00126     
00127     DMatrix<double> u(2,2);
00128     u[0][0] = v[0].x; u[0][1] = v[1].x;
00129     u[1][0] = v[0].y; u[1][1] = v[1].y;
00130     
00131     DMatrix<double> d(2,2);
00132     d[0][0] = sqrt(1/l[0]); d[0][1] = 0;
00133     d[1][0] = 0;            d[1][1] = sqrt(1/l[1]); 
00134     
00135     w = d * u.inv();
00136     
00137     return true;
00138 }
